trans-unit.resname: OHOP·1 | Academy at Tolaria West | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Academy at Tolaria West
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OHOP·1 | Academy at Tolaria West | Card Text
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, if you have no cards in hand, draw seven cards. Whenever you roll chaos, discard your hand.

trans-unit.resname: OHOP·2 | The Aether Flues | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you planeswalk to The Æther Flues or at the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle all other cards revealed this way into your library. Whenever you roll chaos, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.
Agyrem
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Whenever a white creature is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. Whenever a nonwhite creature is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step. Whenever you roll chaos, creatures can't attack you until a player planeswalks.
Bant
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: All creatures have exalted. (Whenever a creature attacks alone, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each instance of exalted among creatures its controller controls.) Whenever you roll chaos, put a divinity counter on target green, white, or blue creature. That creature is indestructible as long as it has a divinity counter on it.
Cliffside Market
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: When you planeswalk to Cliffside Market or at the beginning of your upkeep, you may exchange life totals with target player. Whenever you roll chaos, exchange control of two target permanents that share a type.

trans-unit.resname: OHOP·6 | The Dark Barony | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Dark Barony
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OHOP·6 | The Dark Barony | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever a nonblack card is put into a player's graveyard from anywhere, that player loses 1 life. Whenever you roll chaos, each opponent discards a card.
Eloren Wilds
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Whenever a player taps a permanent for mana, that player adds one mana to his or her mana pool of any type that permanent produced. Whenever you roll chaos, target player can't cast spells until a player planeswalks.

trans-unit.resname: OHOP·8 | The Eon Fog | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Eon Fog
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OHOP·8 | The Eon Fog | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Players skip their untap steps. Whenever you roll chaos, untap all permanents you control.
Feeding Grounds
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Red spells cost {1} less to cast. Green spells cost {1} less to cast. Whenever you roll chaos, put X +1/+1 counters on target creature, where X is that creature's converted mana cost.

trans-unit.resname: OHOP·10 | Fields of Summer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fields of Summer
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OHOP·10 | Fields of Summer | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player may gain 2 life. Whenever you roll chaos, you may gain 10 life.

trans-unit.resname: OHOP·11 | The Fourth Sphere | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Fourth Sphere
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OHOP·11 | The Fourth Sphere | Card Text
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a nonblack creature. Whenever you roll chaos, put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield.

Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell with a single target, he or she copies that spell for each other spell, permanent, card not on the battlefield, and/or player the spell could target. Each copy targets a different one of them. Whenever you roll chaos, choose target creature. Each player except that creature's controller puts a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of that creature.
Goldmeadow
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Whenever a land enters the battlefield, that land's controller puts three 0/1 white Goat creature tokens onto the battlefield. Whenever you roll chaos, put a 0/1 white Goat creature token onto the battlefield.

trans-unit.resname: OHOP·14 | The Great Forest | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Each creature assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power. Whenever you roll chaos, creatures you control get +0/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.
Grixis
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Blue, black, and/or red creature cards in your graveyard have unearth. The unearth cost is equal to the card's mana cost. (Pay the card's mana cost: Return it to the battlefield. The creature gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.) Whenever you roll chaos, put target creature card in a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
The Hippodrome
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: All creatures get -5/-0. Whenever you roll chaos, you may destroy target creature if its power is 0 or less.
Immersturm
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, that creature's controller may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature or player of his or her choice. Whenever you roll chaos, exile target creature, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

trans-unit.resname: OHOP·18 | Isle of Vesuva | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield, its controller puts a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of that creature. Whenever you roll chaos, destroy target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature.

trans-unit.resname: OHOP·19 | Izzet Steam Maze | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Izzet Steam Maze
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OHOP·19 | Izzet Steam Maze | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell, that player copies it. The player may choose new targets for the copy. Whenever you roll chaos, instant and sorcery spells you cast this turn cost {3} less to cast.
All creatures get +2/+2. Whenever you roll chaos, you may add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to your mana pool.
Lethe Lake
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, put the top ten cards of your library into your graveyard. Whenever you roll chaos, target player puts the top ten cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
Llanowar
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: All creatures have "{T}: Add {G}{G} to your mana pool." Whenever you roll chaos, untap all creatures you control.
The Maelstrom
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: When you planeswalk to The Maelstrom or at the beginning of your upkeep, you may reveal the top card of your library. If it's a permanent card, you may put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card on the bottom of your library. Whenever you roll chaos, return target permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Minamo
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Whenever a player casts a spell, that player may draw a card. Whenever you roll chaos, each player may return a blue card from his or her graveyard to his or her hand.
Murasa
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield, its controller may search his or her library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle his or her library. Whenever you roll chaos, target land becomes a 4/4 creature that's still a land.
Naar Isle
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a flame counter on Naar Isle, then Naar Isle deals damage to you equal to the number of flame counters on it. Whenever you roll chaos, Naar Isle deals 3 damage to target player.
Naya
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: You may play any number of additional lands on each of your turns. Whenever you roll chaos, target red, green, or white creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each land you control.
Otaria
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Instant and sorcery cards in graveyards have flashback. The flashback cost is equal to the card's mana cost. (Its owner may cast the card from his or her graveyard for its mana cost. Then he or she exiles it.) Whenever you roll chaos, take an extra turn after this one.
When you planeswalk to Panopticon, draw a card. At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card. Whenever you roll chaos, draw a card.

trans-unit.resname: OHOP·30 | Pools of Becoming | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Pools of Becoming
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OHOP·30 | Pools of Becoming | Card Text
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, put the cards in your hand on the bottom of your library in any order, then draw that many cards. Whenever you roll chaos, reveal the top three cards of your planar deck. Each of the revealed cards' chaos abilities triggers. Then put the revealed cards on the bottom of your planar deck in any order.
Raven's Run
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: All creatures have wither. (They deal damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.) Whenever you roll chaos, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature, two -1/-1 counters on another target creature, and three -1/-1 counters on a third target creature.

trans-unit.resname: OHOP·32 | Sanctum of Serra | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sanctum of Serra
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OHOP·32 | Sanctum of Serra | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you planeswalk away from Sanctum of Serra, destroy all nonland permanents. Whenever you roll chaos, you may have your life total become 20.

trans-unit.resname: OHOP·33 | Sea of Sand | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sea of Sand
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.resname: OHOP·33 | Sea of Sand | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Players reveal each card they draw. Whenever a player draws a land card, that player gains 3 life. Whenever a player draws a nonland card, that player loses 3 life. Whenever you roll chaos, put target permanent on top of its owner's library.
Shiv
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: All creatures have "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn." Whenever you roll chaos, put a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
Skybreen
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Players play with the top card of their libraries revealed. Spells that share a card type with the top card of a library can't be cast. Whenever you roll chaos, target player loses life equal to the number of cards in his or her hand.

All creatures get +1/+1 and have haste. Whenever you roll chaos, untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

If a source would deal damage to a creature or player, it deals double that damage to that creature or player instead. Whenever you roll chaos, Stronghold Furnace deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
Creature spells cost {2} less to cast. Whenever you roll chaos, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all creature cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
Whenever a creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may draw a card. Whenever you roll chaos, you have no maximum hand size for the rest of the game.
Velis Vel
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Each creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield that shares at least one creature type with it. (For example, if two Elemental Shamans and an Elemental Spirit are on the battlefield, each gets +2/+2.) Whenever you roll chaos, target creature gains all creature types until end of turn.
